memberdef.name: ADD_COMMAND
memberdef.initializer: if (commandMap.count(prefix+name) != 0) { \ DG_THROW dg::ExceptionFactory(dg::ExceptionFactory::OBJECT_CONFLICT, \ "Command " + prefix+name + \ " already registered in Entity."); \ } \ commandMap.insert( std::make_pair( prefix+name,def ) )
